help-file.title: CALENDAR MONTHS
help-file.content: (1) Month of Hammer (the Deepwinter) (2) Month of Alturiak (the Claws of the Cold) (3) Month of Ches (of the Sunsets) (4) Month of Tarsakh (of the Storms) (5) Month of Mirtul (the Melting) (6) Month of Bestanth (the Renewal) (7) Month of Kythorn (the Time of Flowers) (8) Month of Flamerule (Summertide) (9) Month of Eleasias (Highsun) (10) Month of Vinthar (of the Harvest) (11) Month of Eleint (the Fading) (12) Month of Marpenoth (Leafall) (13) Month of Uktar (the Rotting) (14) Month of Nightal (the Drawing Down) (15) Month of Mithrian (the Wanting) (16) Month of Horthos (of the Abandoned) (17) Month of Annaxes (the Breath of Frost)
